## ⚠️ POLICY CHANGE REQUEST

**This template is for changes to:**
- Constitution documents (Grunnlov)
- Risk policies
- Capital policies
- Governance rules

**Policy changes require:**
- Founder explicit approval
- Extended review period (minimum 7 days)
- Written justification
